item.title: End US-197 North at WA-14
item.description: End US-197 North at WA-14. Use WA-14 west for Vancouver; WA-14 east for Kennewick.

item.title: US-197 North Approaching WA-14
item.description: US-197 North approaching WA-14 in Klickitat County.

item.title: End Washougal River Road at WA-14
item.description: End Washougal River Road at WA-14. Use WA-14 west for Vancouver; WA-14 east for Kennewick.

item.title: I-205 South - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 south approaching Exit 27 - WA-14/Camas/(Vancouver)City Center. WA-14 is the last exit on I-205 southbound in Washington.

item.title: I-205 South - Exit 28
item.description: I-205 South approaching Exit 28 - Mill Plain Blvd. Travel times to I-84/I-5 Junction (Downtown Portland, Oregon). On this Saturday afternoon it was 20 minutes to I-84/I-5 via I-205 and I-84; 31 minutes via WA-14 and I-5.

item.title: US-97 South at WA-14
item.description: Turn right for WA-14 West to Vancouver. Turn left for WA-14 East to Kennwick and US-97 South/To I-84 to Bend (Oregon). US-97 south joins WA-14 east for a short distance.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching WA-14
item.description: US-97 South approaching WA-14 in Klickitat County. Use US-97 South/WA-14 East to Bend (Oregon - via US-97) and Kennewick (via WA-14).

item.title: WA-14 East - Exit 14
item.description: WA-14 East at Exit 14 - WA-500 West/Union St./2nd St.

item.title: WA-14 East - Exit 12
item.description: WA-14 east at Exit 12 - NW 6th Ave./City Center.

item.title: WA-14 East - Exit 10
item.description: WA-14 east at Exit 10 - SE 192nd Ave.

item.title: WA-14 East - Exit 8
item.description: WA-14 east at Exit 8 - SE 164th Ave.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 27 - WA-14/Vancouver/Camas. This is the first exit in Washington along I-205.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 27 - WA-14/Vancouver/Camas. The milemarkers and exit numbers along I-205 do not reset back to zero when crossing into Washington. They continue on the Oregon numbering scheme. Although this is a Washington exit, this sign is still within Oregon.

item.title: US-97 North at WA-14
item.description: US-97 north at WA-14 north. US-97 north joins WA-14 west for about two miles. Turn right on WA-14 east for Kennewick. Turn left on WA-14 west for Vancouver. Also turn left for US-97 north to Yakima and Goldendale.

item.title: WA-14 East - Lewis and Clark Trail
item.description: WA-14 East - Lewis and Clark Trail

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 131
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 131 - WA-14 West/Plymouth/Vancouver. This is the last Washington exit on I-82.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 131
item.description: I-82 west at Exit 131 - WA-14 West/Plymouth/Vancouver. WA-14 parallels I-84 on the Washington side of the Columbia River.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 131 (Washington)
item.description: I-82 west at Columbia River bridge. Approaching Exit 131 - WA-14/Vancouver/Plymouth.

item.title: Bridge Of The Gods - WA-14
item.description: End of the Bridge of the Gods at WA-14, and Welcome To Washington sign.

item.title: End WA-14 East at I-82
item.description: End WA-14 east at I-82 to Umatilla and Kennewick.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 1A/Vancouver Exits
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 1A (WA) WA-14/Camas, and overhead for next three Vancouver exits. Taken at foot of Interstate Bridge on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North Exits 1A/Exit 1B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 1A, WA-14 East/Camas and approaching Exit 1B, City Center/Convention Center. First Washington Exit.

item.title: WA-14 East at Alt. WA-141
item.description: WA-14 east at WA-141 ALT North to Trout Lake .

item.title: WA-14 East at I-205
item.description: WA-14 east at Exit 6, I-205/Salem/Seattle.

item.title: WA-14 East at Northern End of US-197
item.description: WA-14 east at US-197 south to The Dalles.

item.title: WA-14 East at US-95 South
item.description: WA-14 East/US-97 south at US-97 South/To I-84 to Bend (OR).

item.title: WA-14 East at US-97 North
item.description: WA-14 east approaching US-97 north to Goldendale and Yakima, 1 mile.

item.title: WA-14 East at US-97 North
item.description: WA-14 east at US-97 north to Goldendale and Yakima. US-97 joins WA-14 east for a mile.

item.title: WA-14 East at WA-141
item.description: WA-14 east approaching WA-141 to City Center and Trout Lake, 1 1/2 miles.

item.title: WA-14 East at WA-141 Alt.
item.description: WA-14 east approaching WA-141 ALT to Trout Lake, and Mount Adams Rec. Area.

item.title: WA-14 East at WA-142 East
item.description: WA-14 east approaching WA-142 East to Klickitat and Wahkiacus, 1/2 mile.

item.title: WA-14 East at WA-221 North
item.description: WA-14 east approaching WA-221 north to Prosser.

item.title: WA-14 East Exit 5
item.description: WA-14 west approaching Exit 5, SE Ellsworth Road, next right.

item.title: WA-14 East Exit 6 - I-205 Jct.
item.description: WA-14 east approaching Exit 6. Use Exit 6, I-205 south for I-84 and NE Portland.

item.title: WA-14 East/US-97 South
item.description: WA-14 East/US-97 South to Kennewick and Bend, just east of US-97 north junction.

item.title: WA-14 West - Use Exit 6 For I-84
item.description: WA-14 west approaching I-205. Use I-205 south for I-84 and NE Portland.

item.title: WA-14 West Approaching US-197
item.description: WA-14 west approaching US-197 South/The Dalles, 1/2 mile.

item.title: WA-14 West at Exit 6 I-205 Jct.
item.description: WA-14 west at Exit 6, I-205 north to Seattle, and south to I-84/Salem/NE Portland.

item.description: WA-14 west at US-197 South/The Dalles.

item.title: WA-14 West Exit 6
item.description: WA-14 west approaching I-205 to Seattle and Salem, 1 1/4 mile.

item.title: WA-14 West Exit 6
item.description: WA-14 west approaching Exit 6, I-205 North to Seattle, and south to I-84/Salem/NE Portland.

item.title: Begin WA-14 at I-82 (Exit 131)
item.description: Begin WA-14 at I-82 (Exit 131). Use I-82 west to Kennewick and Yakima. Use I-82 east to Umatilla (Oregon).
